text: Let me get this straight -- guy who ran the Gates-backed Pharma company who is creating leading COVID-19 vaccine is now the vaccine Czar in White House? -- Trump’s New Vaccine Czar Makes $3.4 Million Windfall on Bill Gates-Backed CoronaVirus Vaccine Stock https://t.co/PXSXylMg8K
